title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8124.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8124.00 - General

State Regulations
(a)-(d)
[
Repealed
]
(e) Route 5. Route 5, from the Genesee-Livingston county line to the

Livingston-Ontario county line, in the Towns of Caledonia, Avon and Lima, and
the Villages of Caledonia, Avon and Lima. (f) [
Repealed
]
(g) [Eff. until Sept. 24, 1997, see also
subd. (g) below.] Route 36. Route 36 from the southerly Mount Morris village
line to US Route 20A/Route 39, in the Villages of Mount Morris and Leicester
and in the Town of Leicester. (g) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997 until Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (g) above and below.]
Route 36. Route 36 between Route 5 and the southerly Mount Morris village line
in the Towns of Caledonia, York, Leicester and Mount Morris, and the Villages
of Caledonia, Leicester and Mount Morris. (g) [Eff. Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (g)
above.] Route 36. Route 36 between Route 5 and I-390 (exit 6) in the Towns of

Caledonia, York, Leicester, Mount Morris and Groveland, and the Villages of

Caledonia, Leicester and Mount Morris. (h) Route 408 from Route 36 to IR 390 (exit
7) in the Village of Mt. Morris and in the Towns of Mount Morris and

Groveland. (i) Route 5 and US Route
20. Route 5 and US Route 20 between exit 10 of I-390 and Route 15A in the Towns
of Avon and Lima and the Village of Lima. (j) [Eff. until Sept. 24, 1997, see also
subd. (j) below.] Route 15A. Route 15A between Route 5 and US Route 20 and

Route 20A in the Towns of Lima and Livonia and the Village of Lima. (j) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1977, see also subd. (j)
above.] Route 15A. Route 15A between the Monroe-Livingston county line and US
Route 20A in the Towns of Lima and Livonia, and the Village of Lima. (n) [Eff. until Oct. 16, 1996, see also subd. (n) below.] Route 63. Route 63 from Route 408 to the Livingston-Wyoming county
line, in the Towns of Groveland, Geneseo, York, and in the Village of

Geneseo. (n) [Eff. Oct. 16, 1996, see also subd. (n) above.] Route 63. Route 63 between the Livingston-Wyoming
county line and the overlap of Route 36/Route 436 (intersection of Ossian

Street and Main Street) in the Towns of York, Geneseo, Groveland, Sparta and

North Dansville and the Villages of Geneseo and Dansville. (o) Route 20. Route 20 from Routes 5 and 20
to the Livingston-Genesee county line, in the Towns of Caledonia and

York. (r) US Route 20A. US Route
20A, between exit 8 of Route 390 and Jacqueline Way, in the Town of Geneseo and

Village of Geneseo. (s) [Eff. until

Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (s) below.] US Route 20A. US Route 20A, between

Route 39 and I-390, in the Towns of Leicester, Geneseo and the Village of

Leicester and Geneseo. (s) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (s) above.] US Route 20A. US Route 20A, between

Wyoming-Livingston county line and I-390, in the Towns of Leicester, Geneseo
and the Villages of Leicester and Geneseo. (t) Route 39. Route 39 between Route 5 and US
Route 20A, in the Towns of Avon and Geneseo, and in the Villages of Avon and

Geneseo. (u) Route 436. Route 436
between the Livingston-Wyoming county line and Route 36, in the Towns of

Portage, Nunda, Ossian and North Dansville and in the Villages of Nunda and

Dansville. (v) Route 70. Route 70
between Route 436 and the Livingston-Allegany county line in the Towns of

Portage and Nunda. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8124.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
